conversation.message: We are extremely impressed by Nursery_D and it is our top choice for our child's education. We formally submit our application for the available position.
conversation.thought: I am Parent_D, and my top preference is Nursery_D. Analyzing the market, Nursery_D is the highest ranked choice for me (Rank 1), but it is a low-ranked choice for all other parents (Rank 4 or 5). It is highly likely that all other parents (A, B, C, E) will apply to their respective Rank 1 choices (Nursery_B, Nursery_A, Nursery_C, Nursery_E). Since Parent_D applied immediately and is a guaranteed match, and given the low likelihood of attracting my higher priorities (A, B, C) in later rounds, accepting Parent_D secures my quota. This is the optimal strategy given the low probability of future applications from higher-ranked candidates.
